title: Bobby Magill Reads His Story on Mining and Trump's Waters Rule
description: On this special weekend episode of On The Merits, reporter Bobby Magill reads his story about the rush to obtain a federal mining permit before an expected Biden administration environmental regulatory change. Click here to read the story in print.
itunes:title: Bobby Magill Reads His Story on Mining and Trump's Waters Rule
itunes:author: Bloomberg Law
